name: Exgerminator
description: This was a game I developed while pursuing my bachelors degree in game programming and development. It was made with the help of two of my classmates, Eirwyn Zheng and Christian Kessler. It sees the player using a microscopic ship to enter the body of a sick patient zero and eliminating the virus before it can spread and kill the host. It's a short arcade style shooter that we hope you enjoy. I'm very excited to see all of your feedback and to see what you think of the experience.
